kaitiakiFeaturesDescription: Activar/desactivar las características disponibles para kaitiaki de esta comunidad
memberFeaturesDescription: Activar/desactivar las características disponibles para los miembros y kaitiaki de esta comunidad
verifiedCredentialsOffHelpText: Turning this feature on will allow verified credentials to be attached to a tribal registration
verifiedCredentialsOnHelpText: Turning this feature off will remove the ability to attach verified credentials to a tribal registration
credentialFeaturesDescription: Activate this setting if you would like to issue digital membership credentials to new members
addAcceptCreds: Activate this setting to accept tribal membership credentials with new registrations
